short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how much you are paying with your life for the items you buy online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Pay with life" aims to illustrate how much of our time we are willing to give up for a product we purchase online. 

To begin with, you set your hourly wage and your tax rate. 

As a example, if you earn $20 per hour then all the products in online stores that cost $20 will be replace with 1h. You can also adjust the tax rate to get a more realistic time value.

This extension currently supports dollars ($) and pounds (£). Support for euros (€) might not always work.
